name: io.github.CodeAlive-AI/codealive-mcp
description: Semantic code search and analysis from CodeAlive for AI assistants and agents.

tools.name: get_data_sources
tools.description: Retrieve all available repositories and workspaces indexed in your CodeAlive account. Use this first to discover what codebases you can search and analyze.

tools.name: codebase_search
tools.description: Search across your entire codebase using natural language queries. Find functions, classes, patterns, and implementations with semantic understanding that goes beyond simple text matching.

tools.name: codebase_consultant
tools.description: Get comprehensive AI-powered analysis, explanations, and insights about your codebase. Ask complex questions about architecture, patterns, dependencies, and implementation details.
